message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I know will be extremely valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details yet, I can tell you that it's worth at least $1,000,000 to you. I'm willing to part with it for a price that's fair for both of us. I'm confident we can reach an agreement.  Let's discuss a price of $900,000. What do you think?
